SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.gridgain.grid.cache.datastructures
Interface GridCacheAtomicReference<T>

All Superinterfaces:
GridMetadataAware, Serializable
public interface GridCacheAtomicReference<T>
extends GridMetadataAware

This interface provides a rich API for working with distributed atomic reference.

Note that atomic reference is only available in Enterprise Edition.

Functionality

Distributed atomic reference includes the following main functionality:
  • Method GridCacheAtomicReference.get() synchronously gets current value of an atomic reference.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicReference.set(Object) synchronously and unconditionally sets the value in the an atomic reference.
  • Methods compareAndSet(...) synchronously and conditionally set the value in the an atomic reference.
All previously described methods have asynchronous analogs.
  • Method GridCacheAtomicReference.name() gets name of atomic reference.

Creating Distributed Atomic Reference

Instance of distributed atomic reference can be created by calling one of the following methods:
  • GridCache.atomicReference(String)
  • GridCache.atomicReference(String, Object, boolean)

Wiki & Forum:
